ygData.subject: Re: Ore in Neriak
ygData.msgSnippet: You can buy ore in neriak...foreign quarter.  There s a vendor in that bar where you can see into the water thruogh the windows.  He s tucked away in a corner
ygData.messageBody:
You can buy ore in neriak...foreign quarter. There's a vendor in that bar
where you can see into the water thruogh the windows. He's tucked away in
a corner but there.



On Mon, 31 May 1999, J. Stephen Smith wrote:

> From: "J. Stephen Smith" <js_smith@...>
>
> >From: "S. Haney" <shaney1@...>
> >
> >Hello,
> >
> >I am a Dark Elf who is looking for the location of who sells ore
> >in Neriak. I have found the forge and molds, but cant seem to find the
> >Ore. Can anyone help me?
> >
> >Usriev
> >
>
>
> I believe you'll have to travel to Freeport for your ore. So make sure
> you're not KOS with the Freeport militia or the Freeport Paladins (who
> control the northern part of the city where the ore can be found).
>
> Mysk, Dwarven Paladin, E'ci
>
>
